name: @doridian/luajs
description: Bindings for C Lua to JavaScript with Emscripten and WebAssembly

scripts.clean: emmake make clean && rm -rf ./dist && tsc --build --clean && cd src/ && tsc --build --clean && cd ..
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -f src/luajs.d.ts dist/luajs.d.mts && cp -f src/luajs.d.ts dist/luajs.d.cts && cd src/ && tsc && cd .. && tsc && emmake make install
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run testOnly

author: Doridian
